description:
The captains and lieutenants of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads thought to have fallen in battle return to fight the Reigai. Meanwhile, Ichigo’s spirit energy and Hollow powers continue to grow unstable, forcing him to rest for the time being.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Developer of the Modified Souls
改造魂魄(こんぱく)の開発者
